pub_date: 2023-09-01 The bright end of the galaxy luminosity function at $z\simeq7$ from the VISTA VIDEO survey Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society In this paper we use 8.2 square degrees of optical and near-infrared imaging to measure the rest-frame ultraviolet luminosity function at $z\simeq7$. R. G. Varadaraj et al., 2023, MNRAS, 524, 4586.
